com.itextpdf.text.pdf.parser
Interface RenderListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
TextProvidingRenderListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
FilteredRenderListener, FilteredTextRenderListener, LocationAwareTextExtractingPdfContentRenderListener, SimpleTextExtractingPdfContentRenderListener
public interface RenderListener

A callback interface that receives notificaitons from the PdfContentStreamProcessor as various render operations are required.
Important: This interface may be converted to an abstract base class in the future to allow for adding additional render calls as the content stream processor is enhanced

Since:
5.0
